B

bounce(boolean, int) - Method in class phonegame.MoveableGameItem
Acting on a collision: bounce Move up to the wall you bounce against and reverse speed!

C

changeTile(int, int, byte) - Method in class phonegame.GameEngine
Change a tile in the game world.
clearBackgroundImage() - Method in class phonegame.GameEngine
Clear the background image of the game.
collisionOccured(GameItem) - Method in class phonegame.MoveableGameItem
This method is triggered when an collision between a MoveableGameItem (i.e. the player) and some other gameitem (i.e. a moveable enemy or a static wall) occurs.
collisionOccured(int, boolean, int) - Method in class phonegame.MoveableGameItem
This method is triggered when an collision between a MoveableGameItem (i.e. the player) and a tile (a block in the environment map) or row/column of tiles occurs.

The GameEngine forms the core of the game by controlling the gameloop and the painting operations.

Constructs a new GameEngine.

Custom exception class to handle exceptions thrown by the GameAPI.

Constructs an instance of this class
GameItem - Class in phonegame
class GameItem represents an actor in the game that is not moving.
